snippet.title: Giza (Macintosh game 1996)
snippet.description:
Giza  is an Egyptian style FPS game mixed with a puzzle element.
It is made by Squeegee Software in 1996.

The object of the game is that the main character should gather all the slates of Egypt style and put the puzzle properly in your own Apple Newton. (Newton was a PDA made by Apple)
Then you can go to the next level.

In my view, This game is not interesting.
Because the game play screen is so small.
